dt-api.name: scroller.toPosition()
dt-api.summary: Scroll to a specific row display index

type.description: Move the display to show the row at the index given.

dt-api.description: This method can be used to move the scrolling position to a given row in the current display order. If you know the row you wish to scroll to, use the `-api row().scrollTo()` method - this method is useful for cases where you don't know what row is in the position you wish to scroll to!
